dmca.title: Domain Inquiry For DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jared Karnes [mailto:jakarnes@gmail.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 09, 2007 7:55 PM
To: zzzzzz
Subject: Domain Inquiry For DMCA Complaint

Good Day,

I am in the process of getting together the information to file a  
DMCA complaint against the company that owns the domain  
painfulpleasures.com for illegally sourcing and selling duplicate  
products to which we own the rights. These products are jewelry  
designs which have been exactly copied and are being sold without  
permission.

The purpose of this communication is to verify that The Planet hosts  
the offending website (or get some information about who does host it  
if you have better resources than I do). A WHOIS request for  
painfulpleasures.com was showing the site being hosted by Everyone's  
Internet (EV1) and it's my understanding that The Planet now includes  
all of those previous customers. If The Planet is now the host for  
this address, please let me know so I may go forward with submitting  
my DMCA complaint.

Also, from my reading your DMCA PDF it's my understanding that  
complaints must be submitted in writing. Does this mean they must be  
mailed or is it possible to fax these complaints? I recently went  
through this process with BlueHost in regard to another offending  
business which was purchasing these copied designs, and the process  
was able to be completed by fax. However I need to do it is fine, I  
just need clarification.

Thanks much and I look forward to working with you to resolve this  
matter.

Jared Karnes
Onetribe LLC
